title: How Leaders Can Create a Purpose-Driven Culture - HBR.org Daily
summary: The article highlights the growing importance of companies integrating a purpose beyond profit into their operations. title: Casio to release Charles Darwin Foundation collaboration G-SHOCK watches - Japan Today
summary: Casio Computer Co. Ltd has released three new G-SHOCK watches in collaboration with the Charles Darwin Foundation, a non-profit dedicated to Galapagos conservation. These watches feature designs inspired by Galapagos wildlife and use bio-based resin made from renewable resources. A portion of the proceeds from sales will support the Foundation's conservation efforts.

title: Mountain Partnership: News detail - Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations
summary: The International Network for Bamboo and Rattan (INBAR) promotes sustainable development using bamboo and rattan. INBAR works with mountain communities to address climate change and poverty, focusing on bamboo's role in mitigating climate change and promoting sustainable livelihoods. They implement projects like the Bambuzonía project in the Amazon and the Dutch-Sino East Africa Development project, showcasing the economic and ecological benefits of bamboo and rattan.
official_company_name: International Network for Bamboo and Rattan
product_or_process: Bamboo-farming systems and sustainable management practices

title: New tangle bins for popular Darwin, Palmerston fishing spots - NT Independent
summary: OzFish Unlimited and Amateur Fishermen’s Association NT are installing tangle bins across popular fishing spots in the Darwin and Palmerston region to help keep the waterways clean from discarded fishing gear. The bins will be placed in eight designated areas where recreational fishers frequently fish, with OzFish recycling the recovered lines and gear through its Tackle Loop initiative. The project aims to make it easier for fishers to dispose of their fishing waste responsibly and promote environmental stewardship within the fishing community.

greenwashing: The project does not appear to be an example of greenwashing as it focuses on genuine environmental improvement through waste reduction and recycling.

title: Retail India News: Clensta Unveils Innovative Eggstreme Range - Indian Retailer
summary: Juicy Chemistry and Mommy Shots by Amrita launched a campaign called 'Scars are Beautiful' to celebrate postpartum bodies and stretch marks.
